story:
Once upon a time in the beautiful land of Kenya, there lived a young boy named Mwangi. Mwangi was a curious and adventurous child who loved to explore the vast African savannah and all its wonders.

One evening, as the sun started to set over the horizon, Mwangi's mother called out to him, "It's time to come inside and get ready for bed, Mwangi." Reluctantly, Mwangi left his outdoor adventures behind and made his way back home.

As Mwangi settled into his cozy bed, his mother sat down beside him and began to tell him a magical bedtime story. She spoke of a wise old elephant who roamed the plains, guiding lost animals back to their families with his gentle wisdom and kind heart.

Mwangi's eyes grew heavy as he listened to his mother's soothing voice, and soon he drifted off to sleep, dreaming of the wise elephant and the vast African savannah.

In his dreams, Mwangi found himself walking alongside the majestic elephant, feeling safe and guided by its presence. Together, they journeyed through the lush landscapes of Kenya, encountering all sorts of creatures along the way.

As the first light of dawn began to break, Mwangi woke up feeling refreshed and inspired by the magical adventure he had just experienced. He knew that no matter where his curiosity and adventures took him, he would always be guided by the wise old elephant in his heart.

And so, Mwangi closed his eyes once more, drifting off into a peaceful sleep, ready to embrace the wonders of a new day in the beautiful land of Kenya.

The end. Goodnight, dear Mwangi. Sweet dreams.
